title: Market Place
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Italian, Organic, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Russian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A chain of self-service cafes, with an open kitchen has a friendly atmosphere and uses organic ingredients sourced from local farms. Offers many vegan choices such as buckwheat with mushrooms, cabbage salads, grilled  veggies, soups, and pasta. The selection varies by hour and day. Has a view of the Kazan Cathedral. As of Sept 2014, one of the cooks is vegan. Vegan choices are not labeled so please ask wait staff.
